properties.verseOrder: v1 p c v2 p c

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: When the music fades All is stripped away And I simply come Longing just to bring Something that's of worth That will bless your heart

verse.name: p
verse.lines: I'll bring you more than a song For a song in itself Is not what you have required You search much deeper within Through the way things appear You're looking into my heart

verse.name: c
verse.lines: I'm coming back to the heart of worship And it's all about you, It's all about you, Jesus I'm sorry, Lord, for the thing I've made it When it's all about you, It's all about you, Jesus

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: King of endless worth No one could express How much you deserve Though I'm weak and poor All I have is yours Every single breath
